attributes.title: Absolutely the worst.
attributes.review: First of all, the wait for this download was ABSURD. Are you kidding me?? A whole month?? For this app?? No. But that was just the beginning. I thought I was going to be warmly welcomed by a fun and bright community of white supremacy, instead, I got bugs and glitches and endless technological problems. As a woman, i don‚Äôt really understand what‚Äôs happening or how to fix it, and I unfortunately do not have a big strong man husband to help me! >:(. It stinks worse than the locker rooms where our faithful president himself chats with his friends about his ugly sexual conquests. ‚ù§Ô∏è

attributes.title: TERRIBLE! DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I tried to download this app and it took forever!!! I was amazed how slow and INEFFECTIVE this app was at doing its job. It never even tried to do what it promised. It was so weird because i dont even remember downloading it. I had a strange feeling that an outside source put this app in my way. No one ever thought that this app would even be in the app store, nevertheless downloaded onto their phones. Now, everyone I know has to face the consequences of this app being allowed in the store. I believe that it should not have even been to be made into an app, but thats just my opinion. Anyway be warned that this app DOESNT WORK and SHOULD NOT BE DOWNLOADED!!!!!!

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: This app took all day to download, thank heavens fox news had 24/7 coverage on the television to keep me occupied by telling me who to be angry at that day. After I got done kissing my dad on the lips I opened this app and it immediately asked for my phone number and my name. It was OBVIOUSLY the Russians trying to steal my information so they can sell it to the liberal sheep, ya know the ones who believe in modern medicine and dinosaurs. Anyways I can't figure out how to delete this app but I feel like you should apologize to me for my pain and suffering from this terrifying experience because the world owes me for any minor inconvenience and I take zero accountability.

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible, a disgrace of a app
attributes.review: This app is completely terrible, once opening the app everything seems normal. But soon after photos and and other data will start to disappear of off your device. This app steals data and uses it against you in order for you to vote for trump. The app also throws around racial slurs like its nothing. Even asking you to leave the country if you are from Mexico, and telling you to die if you are black. Lgtbq+ people receive a notification telling you to be straight or you will be given the death penalty. This app should not be on the app store what so ever! Please do not download app.

attributes.title: DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app is terrible. not only did it ruin my phone battery. but it also wiped my phone. as soon as i opened the app my phone started glitching and the screen turned black multiple times. it then shows the apple turning on screen. once it turns back on everything is gone. all my files, photos, apps. everything. i try to back up my phone from cloud and it tells me my phone isn‚Äôt capable . it screwed with the whole software. i called apple there‚Äôs nothing they can do. and this app caused all of this. absolutely terrible. this app needs to be removed if its happening more then once

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APPüò°üò°üò°

IF I COULD GIVE THIS 0 STARS I WOULD!!!! DONT GET THIS SAVE YOUR PHONE FROM ACTING UP!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app made me fall down the stairs to where i saw a skunk. the skunk sprayed everywhere so i ended up going blind and collapsing onto the freezer to which my hands when completely numb so as i tried driving to the doctor my fingers couldn‚Äôt move so i crashed into a stoplight, causing it to go on fire. the people got very mad and start fighting so it started a tornado cuz the universe was mad so not only did this app start a fire, but it created a massive tornado which made everyone fly into the air and then the dinosaurs rose from the dead. they stomped on everyone. they died. so ya i wouldn‚Äôt recommend getting this app if you want the human population to go extinct.
